home.app_subtitle: Paste a password, secret message, or private information.
home.welcome: Keep your sensitive information out of chat logs, emails, and more with heavily encrypted secrets.
home.title: Secret name
home.burn_aftertime: Burn the secret only after the time expires
home.restrict_from_ip: Restrict the secret from being opened based on an IP or a CIDR range. Example CIDR: 192.168.1.0/24.
home.link_only_works_once: The secret link only works once, and then it will disappear.

secret.will_show_once: We will only show the secret once.
secret.password_required: A password is required to open this secret
